channel.title: CVE Feed for https://elementor.com/ -- Elementor Website Builder Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for https://elementor.com/ -- Elementor Website Builder Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-2781|2024-03-27T06:40:49.006Z -- https%3A%2F%2Felementor.com%2F -- elementor%20website%20builder%20pro
item.description: The Elementor Website Builder Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the video_html_tag attribute in all versions up to, and including, 3.20.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
